testsuite.name: Buffer Service Implementation Tests

testcase.name: Buffer exists - Negative: Device doesn't belong to client
Get buffers by client - Negative: Device service returns error
Update buffer - Positive

failure.message: org.mockito.exceptions.misusing.UnnecessaryStubbingException: Unnecessary stubbings detected. Clean & maintainable test code requires zero unnecessary code.
